name: Nemesia

Avoid letting the soil dry out completely between waterings.

soil: Well-draining soil is essential to prevent water accumulation at roots.
A mix of garden soil with compost achieves the right balance of nutrients.
Sandy loam or light, rich soil enhances the plant's growth potential.

extra_care_tip: Pinching back stems encourages bushier growth and more blooms.
